entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Couple tests from System.Data.DataSetExtensions.Tests fail on NativeAOT #79513
  • [STJ] NumberHandling property of JsonSerializerOptions is ignored when using json SrcGen #79511

Closed

  • MetaMask State logs - v5.12.0 (1024) #79512
  • DeskTop #79507
  • MacOS 104 path length limit. Invalid length for use with domain sockets on this platform. The length must be between 1 and 104 #79503

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Making Libraries tests to pass with NativeAOT #79509
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] mount VFS archive instead of copying it to MEMFS #79506
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Support deleting "entire" stores in the VN-based dead store removal phase #79505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Properly mark compilation as having throw helpers in debug codegen #79504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Select libraries using the ICU build time version #79259
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw helpers in more places #79460
    area-Meta, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C Marshal: object tracker support #78280
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix versions of the .NET 8 ILC package #79497
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Link static libstdc++ with libicuc in NativeAOT #79501
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] reduce MethodImplOptions.NoInlining #79457
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use helpers for implicit casts in importer #78279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preparation for JIT\Regression test merging - assembly/file renames #79489
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • This fixes emitGetVexPrefixSize to support detecting 2-byte prefix support #79478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix `IDesignerSerializationManager` nullability #79429
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find references to symbol displays regex-formatted strings incorrectly #65926

Closed

  • Bug 60365 - Escaped keywords autocomplete to the unescaped keyword #22885
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Draft for personal review - don't review for now #65925
    Area-IDE, Community

Updated

  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix several issues with CreateSpan support #65919
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json, json_nodejs #45545
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #45544
  • net7 blazor AuthorizeRouteView.NotAuthorized can not get AuthenticationState #45543
  • [Minimal API] Route, Query and Header parameter names are ignored when using WithOpenApi extension method #45542
  • Perf regression: plaintext #45539
  • Runtime Ubuntu v6.0.111 .NET location: Not found for tools #45537

PullRequests

Created

  • Improved rate limiting tests #45541
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45538
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2065036 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove cruft from Windows bundle installers #45446
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StreamImageSource not working for iOS #12020
  • Intellisense does not correctly handle [ContentProperty] on DataTemplateSelector #12017
  • MauiImage resource as stream missing #12015
  • Click goes through solid elements on android #12014

Closed

  • Update vs to Version 17.4.0 Preview 2.0 causes Could not find android.jar for API level 31 error #10222
    .NET 7 Planning
  • indexdb Creation Issues In MAUI Blazor (Android) #12016
  • Modal pages in Android overlaps Android status bar #6214
    Backlog
  • BlazorWebView error when doing XAML Hot Reload #11835
    Backlog
  • iOS publish Release not working after update to net7 #11882

PullRequests

Updated

  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet ef migrations add freezes #29826
  • JSON: Allow weakly-typed mapping via Dictionary #29825

PullRequests

Updated

  • Switch to interpreted delegates for one-off invocations #29815
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
    Servicing-consider
